ORIGAM Documentation : Screen Menu Item

Created by Tomáš Vavrda, last modified on Jul 07, 2015

This menu assigns a Screen that will open when the user will execute the menu item.

Attributes

ScreenScreen to be displayed.
ReadOnlyAccessDefines if the user will be able to save any changes done in the screen. You can use this setting to allow some roles to only view data without being able to change them.
